column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I love Lou Malnati's in general
column2: but this location in particular is fantastic.  Every time I've been here
column3: the pizza has been perfect.  The only drawbacks are the long lines and packs of tourists
column4: but I also am happy to see out-of-towners get to appreciate the best we have to offer!  The crust is phenomenal
column6: and the tomatoes add the perfect tang to the combination.  This is a favorite for me and my boyfriend.  We always fight over the leftovers!
